title: Centre for Human Rights calls for more reflection on ICC withdrawal (University of Pretoria)
text: ( Source : University of Pretoria ) Back Centre for Human Rights calls for more reflection on ICC withdrawal 14 October 2015 The Centre for Human Rights at the University of Pretoria's Faculty of Law regrets the decision, made this weekend by
